name: Self Destructive
description:
There is only one enemy, you. 

Constantly striving to improve, you must beat each checkpoint faster than you beat the last one, points are given based on your speed. 

Do you start slow and get a worse score but make later checkpoints easier or do you blaze through each checkpoint getting the highest score but less time to complete subsequent checkpoints.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • R to quick reset to last checkpoint
  • Hold H to hard reset the whole game

Can you get to the devs high score of 128000?

Credits:

Music - Kevin Macleod 

Some level design help from Raymond Liu

big thanks to all playtesters and anyone who plays my game

(the game lags on the last levels but we'll call that a feature)
